message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.RO 

The paper deals with action recognition using computer vision techniques, specifically Dense Trajectories and Localized Trajectories. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes an improved version of Dense Trajectories using local Bag-of-Words, which involves machine learning techniques, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses the generalization of Localized Trajectories to 3D using RGB-D cameras, which involves robotics and computer graphics, making cs.RO (Robotics) and cs.MM (Multimedia) possible sub-categories. Finally, the paper proposes a more discriminative representation of actions, which involves artificial intelligence techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another possible sub-category.
